mapper.select: select * from (select * from Goods where GoodsID not in (#{goodsID}) )as a where a.ItemsName =#{itemsName} and ItemsType = #{itemsType}
select * from Goods left join Category on Goods.CategoryID = Category.CategoryID where GoodsID=#{id}
select [Goods].ItemsName from [Summary],[Goods] where [Summary].Time like #{Time}+'%' and [Goods].GoodsID = [Summary].GoodsID group by [Goods].ItemsName

select [Goods].ItemsName from [Goods], (SELECT * FROM Summary s1 WHERE not EXISTS(select GoodsID from Summary s2 WHERE s2.Time>s1.Time and s1.GoodsID = s2.GoodsID)) s where [Goods].GoodsID = s.GoodsID group by [Goods].ItemsName

select Goods.GoodsID,Goods.CategoryID,Goods.ItemsName,Goods.ItemsType,Goods.ItemsUnit,SummaryID,PreAmount,PreTotal,InAmount,InPrice,InTotal,OutAmount,OutTotal,ThisAmount,ThisPrice,ThisTotal,Time,StorePosition from Goods, (select * from (SELECT * FROM Summary s1 WHERE not EXISTS (select GoodsID from Summary s2 WHERE s2.Time>s1.Time and s1.GoodsID = s2.GoodsID))s2 where s2.GoodsID in (select GoodsID from Summary where GoodsID in( select GoodsID from Goods where CategoryID=( select CategoryID from Category where CategoryName=#{CategoryName})) group by GoodsID))s, (SELECT * FROM ItemsIn i1 WHERE not EXISTS (select GoodsID from ItemsIn i2 WHERE i1.ItemsInID>i2.ItemsInID and i1.GoodsID = i2.GoodsID))i where Goods.GoodsID = s.GoodsID and Goods.GoodsID = i.GoodsID

select Goods.ItemsName from Goods, (select * from (SELECT * FROM Summary s1 WHERE not EXISTS (select GoodsID from Summary s2 WHERE s2.Time>s1.Time and s1.GoodsID = s2.GoodsID))s2 where s2.GoodsID in (select GoodsID from Summary where GoodsID in (select GoodsID from Goods where CategoryID=(select CategoryID from Category where CategoryName=#{CategoryName})) group by GoodsID))s where Goods.GoodsID=s.GoodsID group by Goods.ItemsName

select Goods.GoodsID,Goods.CategoryID,Goods.ItemsName,Goods.ItemsType,Goods.ItemsUnit,SummaryID,PreAmount,PreTotal,InAmount,InPrice,InTotal,OutAmount,OutTotal,ThisAmount,ThisPrice,ThisTotal,Time,StorePosition from (SELECT * FROM Summary s1 WHERE not EXISTS (select GoodsID from Summary s2 WHERE s2.Time>s1.Time and s1.GoodsID = s2.GoodsID))s2,Goods,(SELECT * FROM ItemsIn i1 WHERE not EXISTS (select GoodsID from ItemsIn i2 WHERE i1.ItemsInID>i2.ItemsInID and i1.GoodsID = i2.GoodsID))i where s2.GoodsID in(select GoodsID from Goods where ItemsName=#{ItemsName}) and s2.GoodsID=Goods.GoodsID and Goods.GoodsID = i.GoodsID

select top (#{back}- #{front}+1) * from (select Row_Number() over ( order by GoodsID ) as id , * from ( select * from Goods )as show)as show1 where id not in ( select top (#{front}-1) id from (select Row_Number() over ( order by GoodsID ) as id , * from ( select * from Goods )as show)as show1 )
